movie.title: The Cleanse
movie.description_intro: A heartbroken man attends a spiritual retreat to cleanse himself and fix his broken life. There he meets a fellow lost soul, and together they discover that "the cleanse" releases more than everyday toxins...a lot more.
movie.description_full: A heartbroken man attends a spiritual retreat to cleanse himself and fix his broken life. There he meets a fellow lost soul, and together they discover that "the cleanse" releases more than everyday toxins...a lot more.

movies.title: Eat, Play, Love
movies.summary: Veterinarian Dr. Carly Monroe (Jen Lilley) makes it a habit to stop by the local dog shelter as often as possible because she loves dogs and secretly loves the shelter's owner, Dan Landis (Jason Cermak). Unfortunately, he has agreed to marry his glamorous television personality girlfriend, Kristi (Emily Maddison), and move to the Big Apple. With Dan's big move looming, his sister Michelle (Lucie Guest) decides to take matters into her own hands.
movies.description_full: Veterinarian Dr. Carly Monroe (Jen Lilley) makes it a habit to stop by the local dog shelter as often as possible because she loves dogs and secretly loves the shelter's owner, Dan Landis (Jason Cermak). Unfortunately, he has agreed to marry his glamorous television personality girlfriend, Kristi (Emily Maddison), and move to the Big Apple. With Dan's big move looming, his sister Michelle (Lucie Guest) decides to take matters into her own hands.

movies.summary: A closeted young man goes home for the holidays and struggles to reveal his dire circumstances to his conservative family.
movies.description_full: A closeted young man goes home for the holidays and struggles to reveal his dire circumstances to his conservative family.
movies.synopsis: A closeted young man goes home for the holidays and struggles to reveal his dire circumstances to his conservative family.

movies.title: 3 Days to Kill
movies.summary: Dying of brain cancer, a dangerous international spy is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter, whom he's previously kept at arm's length to keep out of danger; but first, he must complete one last mission - even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunt down the world's most ruthless terrorist and look after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years while his wife is out of town.

movies.title: Eight Hours of Terror
movies.summary: The plot concerns a passenger train which is stalled when a typhoon wrecks the tracks. The commuters are offloaded onto a shuttle bus, which is then taken over by a pair of sadistic gangsters.
movies.description_full: The plot concerns a passenger train which is stalled when a typhoon wrecks the tracks. The commuters are offloaded onto a shuttle bus, which is then taken over by a pair of sadistic gangsters.
